resourceTemplates.name: site-metadata
resourceTemplates.title: Get site metadata
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves metadata and settings for the SharePoint site.

resourceTemplates.name: lists-collection
resourceTemplates.title: List all site lists
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all lists in the current SharePoint site.

resourceTemplates.name: list-items-by-title
resourceTemplates.title: Get list items by title
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all items from a specific list by list title.

resourceTemplates.name: list-fields-by-title
resourceTemplates.title: Get list fields by title
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all fields (columns) for a specific list by title.

resourceTemplates.name: list-items-by-guid
resourceTemplates.title: Get list items by GUID
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all items from a specific list using its GUID.

resourceTemplates.name: create-new-list
resourceTemplates.title: Create new list
resourceTemplates.description: Creates a new list in the current SharePoint site (use POST with payload).

resourceTemplates.name: files-in-folder
resourceTemplates.title: List files in folder
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all files in a specified SharePoint folder.

resourceTemplates.name: download-file
resourceTemplates.title: Download file content
resourceTemplates.description: Downloads the binary content of a file by its server-relative URL.

resourceTemplates.name: site-users
resourceTemplates.title: List site users
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all users for the current SharePoint site.

resourceTemplates.name: site-groups
resourceTemplates.title: List site groups
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all SharePoint groups for the site, including permission groups.

resourceTemplates.name: site-has-unique-permissions
resourceTemplates.title: Check if site has unique permissions
resourceTemplates.description: Indicates whether the site has unique (non-inherited) permissions.

resourceTemplates.name: site-role-assignments
resourceTemplates.title: Get site role assignments
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all role assignments (who has which permissions) for the site. Shows unique permissions if they exist.

resourceTemplates.name: folder-has-unique-permissions
resourceTemplates.title: Check folder unique permissions
resourceTemplates.description: Indicates whether the folder has unique (non-inherited) permissions.

resourceTemplates.name: file-has-unique-permissions
resourceTemplates.title: Check file unique permissions
resourceTemplates.description: Indicates whether the file has unique (non-inherited) permissions.

resourceTemplates.name: item-role-assignments
resourceTemplates.title: Get list item role assignments
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all role assignments for a list item, showing unique permissions if present.

resourceTemplates.name: file-list-item
resourceTemplates.title: Get file list item metadata
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the ListItem object for a specific file in a SharePoint document library, enabling access to metadata and permission details associated with that file.
